title: [移民日本嘅好機會] 係日本教英文!

replies.msg:
【Yaruki Switch Group】
Native English speaking staff recruitment in 2018!
Application URL: http://bit.ly/2LVoprl

Yaruki Switch Group is currently hiring native English speakers as teachers at their English schools in Japan. However, this is not your ordinary English conversation teacher gig! At Yaruki Switch, even non-Japanese speakers can advance their career into management positions within 2-3 years.

This position does NOT require any proficiency in Japanese. This is because the company has a comprehensive on-boarding support system in place to help new team members get acclimated to their new lif
e in Japan. This encompasses visa support, housing support, and career advancement initiatives.

Yaruki Switch Group oversees 1,400 schools across their network. Central to the company’s mission is the nurturing of children’s confidence, motivation, and jibun ryoku, or “self-power.” If the follow
ing describe you, then may be just the type of person Yaruki Switch is looking for!

★Passionate about teaching
★Creative, motivated, and professional
★Love working with kids
★Native English speaker
★Available to start working immediately

Specifically, Yaruki Switch is hiring at three of their branded schools. Here’s a brief description of each:

WinBe
At WinBe, the mission is to have fun while learning, a motto which applies to students and teachers alike. WinBe provides young learners with a program to gain real-world English communication skills 
through a conversation- and cultural exchange-driven curriculum. Activities outside the classroom are also used to enrich students’ experience.

Kids Duo
Kids Duo provides after-school and preschool programs for children aged 3 to 12. With a mix of native English-speaking and bilingual teachers, kids learn to speak natural English. The atmosphere is re
laxed and friendly, so that children can enjoy themselves through English education. “Play in English, learn in English” is the name of the game at Kids Duo.

Kids Duo International
Kids Duo International is a bilingual kindergarten whose scope covers English, Japanese, and Physical education. The mission is to give kids a head start before beginning their journey through the Jap
anese school system. The English curriculum at Kids Duo International includes programs such as: reading, writing, phonics, life skills, storytelling, and arts & crafts. Students also broaden their un
derstanding of world cultures and society through school events and trips.

Monthly salary
250,000 yen/month

計落都接近萬八蚊一個月，唔洗識日文就有機會過去做嘢，教英文又唔洗去忍受d on9職場文化，做多幾年要攞永住權都唔難

高學歷高語言能力嘅連登仔仲唔狗衝

就算係ABC去教,日本仔學完咪又係會搞出ten ten ten ten ten...呢類笑話

加埋日本職場d潛規則...真係你做埋我嗰份
連登仔英文咁勁，點會扮唔到native啊
